response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is estimated at $10,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our product.", "product_price": 9500}
